statements: DELETE FROM WasteToEnergyData WHERE facility_name = 'Eco Energy Plant' AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProcessInfo WHERE process_name = 'Cooling Process';
DELETE FROM EnergyOutput WHERE id = 5 AND date = '2022-01-15';

DELETE FROM Plant_Energy_Output WHERE plant_id = (SELECT id FROM Energy_Plants WHERE location = 'New York')
DELETE FROM PlantLocation WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM PlantLocation WHERE location = 'New York' AND capacity < 5000;
